mapper.select: SELECT chatting_room_no chattingRoomNo , chatting_no chattingNo , chatting_memo chattingMemo , DATE_FORMAT(createdate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') createdate , from_id fromId FROM chatting WHERE chatting_room_no = #{chattingRoomNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatting_room ( createdate , updatedate ) VALUES ( NOW() , NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT c.chatting_room_no chattingRoomNo , c.chatting_memo chattingMemo , c.from_id fromId , cr.updatedate updatedate FROM chatting c INNER JOIN chatting_room cr ON cr.chatting_room_no = c.chatting_room_no WHERE (c.chatting_room_no, c.createdate) IN( SELECT chatting_room_no, MAX(createdate) createdate FROM chatting GROUP BY chatting_room_no ) ORDER BY c.chatting_room_no desc
